definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
lit. the spring comes upon a withered tree (idiom)/fig. to get a new lease on life/to be revived/(of a difficult situation) to suddenly improve

sentences.english: Making dead wood more blessed than living lips.
sentences.chinese: 使枯木比活生生的雙脣更爲幸福。

sentences.english: Wu, poisson if poor if dead stream, deer, turn die alone between military ravines occasion.
sentences.chinese: 兀若枯木，泊若窮流，鹿獨戎馬之間，轉死溝壑之際。

sentences.english: Making dead wood more blest than living lips.
sentences.chinese: 使枯木比活嘴脣更值得豔羨。

sentences.english: Look at that long levee of logs.
sentences.chinese: 你看，就是那邊的枯木長堤。

sentences.english: These logs were blown up here from the downstream part of the lake.
sentences.chinese: 這些枯木都是從下游被風逆流吹上來的。

sentences.english: My dear teacher, your love can make the dead tree burst the new bud, make the desert become the oasis.
sentences.chinese: 老師，您的愛能使枯木爆出新芽，使沙漠變成綠洲。

sentences.english: Many a little makes a mickle. Over time, a long levee of logs was thus formed.
sentences.chinese: 日積月累，積少成多，就形成了現在的這條枯木長堤。

sentences.english: Several withered trees on the sides of the road reveal the desolation here.
sentences.chinese: 道路兩旁的幾棵枯木顯示出這裏的荒涼。

sentences.english: It is very easy to notice dead wood on the apple-tree.
sentences.chinese: 在蘋果樹上發現枯木是很容易的。

sentences.english: This allows the teacher has been engaged in Chinese language education in the feeling of being vitality.
sentences.chinese: 這讓從事漢語教育的老師有了枯木逢春的感覺。
